name: Bottom of the Planet
description:
You are a space explorer who has fallen
into a deep cave of an unknown planet.
Without access to your communicator,
you must return to your ship while dodging
the attacks of hostile creatures that inhabit the place.
--=--
This short game was made in 4 days for the Beginners Circle Jam #3.
My first attempt on a Jam, and also my first game ever.
--=--
Additional controls:
M = to turn on/off music
R = Reset the level
